SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! ========================================================== ! ! Include: run cmd on linux to list the contant of a ! zip file. ! ! the files included in the zip file are shown in the ! job output (AE report type REP) ! ! # input vraiables + ! + ================ + ==================================== ! + &BBC_ZIP_PATH# + path where the zip file is located ! + &BBC_ZIP_FILE# + name of the zip file ! ! # output variables ! + ================ + ==================================== ! ! ========================================================== cd &BBC_ZIP_PATH# unzip -l &BBC_ZIP_FILE#
